name: GSKMEDINFO
0:
”Alexa, run GSK MED INFO”
”Alexa, ask GSK MED INFO What is the Mechanism of action of Nucala?”
”Alexa, ask GSK MED INFO What is the stability of havrix below recommended range?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: g. s. k. med info
Developer Terms of Use
des:
More specifically:

1) The skill allows patients to access brand websites for GSK products so they can access prescribing information, medication guides, etc. The skill also allows patients can also connect to GSK Response Center to talk to a live agent.

2) The skill also allows HCPs to get answers to their most frequently-asked questions, connect with their nearest medical science liaison, as well as talk to a live agent at the GSK Medical Affairs contact center.
